subject: keep us in your thoughts
author: mamahaugs
full_text:
Hi I am newer to this sight I enjoy reading all your messages. My step 
daughter Nina Ornelis disappered in the Rock River yesterday afternoon 
around 2:30 search starts again at daybreak. and if anyone can check 
the otherside if you happen to find out where we should be looking 
please call Tammi at 641 782-5914. My husband name is Rich. Thanks 
Tammi
